concept.definition: A claim for Institution based, typically in-patient, goods and services.
A claim for Oral Health (Dentist, Denturist, Hygienist) goods and services.
A claim for Pharmacy based goods and services.
A claim for Professional, typically out-patient, goods and services.
A claim for Vision (Opthamologist, Optometrist and Optician) goods and services.

description: The type or discipline-style of the claim
name: ClaimType2

text.div:
ClaimType2

The type or discipline-style of the claim

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/claim-type-link2 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
institutional InstitutionalA claim for Institution based, typically in-patient, goods and services.
oral Oral HealthA claim for Oral Health (Dentist, Denturist, Hygienist) goods and services.
pharmacy PharmacyA claim for Pharmacy based goods and services.
professional ProfessionalA claim for Professional, typically out-patient, goods and services.
vision VisionA claim for Vision (Opthamologist, Optometrist and Optician) goods and services.
